content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy We provide practical, straightforward advice and training so you can plan, publish, share and preserve your research. Advice on routes to OA, funding options and policies of REF, UoN and external funders Guidance on the literature searching process Planning, archiving and publishing your research data Advice on research metrics, researcher profile and understanding impact data Access secure datasets from participating data centres across the UK Library training for postgraduate research students and researchers King's Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR Please see our Help and support page for telephone and email contact points
